context_bundle.summary: Event sourcing stores state changes as sequence of events: Append events to immutable log, rebuild current state by replaying events. Benefits: Complete audit trail, time travel debugging, event replay for analytics. Use event store (EventStoreDB, Kafka) for persistence.

onboarding.quick_start: Event sourcing stores state changes as sequence of events: Append events to immutable log, rebuild current state by replaying events. Benefits: Complete audit trail, time travel debugging, event replay for analytics. Use event store (EventStoreDB, Kafka) for persistence.
